item.title: Markdown Syntax - Code, Code Blocks and Image
item.author: 13050082@qq.com (Homecat)
item.description: This post showcases the manifestations of the markdown grammar related to code, code blocks and image in this hugo theme.

item.title: Markdown Syntax - Table, Footnotes, Links and Lists
item.author: 13050082@qq.com (Homecat)
item.description: This post showcases the manifestations of the markdown grammar related to table, footnotes, links and lists in this hugo theme.

item.title: Markdown Syntax - Text
item.author: 13050082@qq.com (Homecat)
item.description: Markdown is a lightweight markup language used to add formatting elements to plain text documents. This post showcases the manifestations of the markdown grammar related to text in this hugo theme.

item.title: Shortcode Syntax - Figure
item.author: 13050082@qq.com (Homecat)
item.description: In hugo theme Walden, the application of shortcodes enrich the presentation of content and is constantly maintained and updated.
